snippet: Fiona Apple’s performance at South by Southwest was the beginning of a mini-tour — including shows in New York City on March 23 and 26  —  to preview her first album since 2005.
abstract: Fiona Apple’s performance at South by Southwest was the beginning of a mini-tour — including shows in New York City on March 23 and 26  —  to preview her first album since 2005.

headline.main: Fiona Apple Returns, Still Enraged and Self-Lacerating
